instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Mac Pro 2019 - not MacBook
threads.message:
Hi guys… I really need your help on this Mac Pro 2019 A1991. I’ve never touched something like this… my first time😅. 
this Mac Pro (Sorry i Can not find the board number) is bootlooping… boot sound and shuts down…. Boot chime and shots down… and and and. I do not know where to start. No signs of damage/liquid. Looks like new. Does anybody know where to start? I have no spareparts at all and data is very important.

threads.title: Mac Pro 2019 - not MacBook
threads.message:
No schematic available for any Mac Pro.

Try starting in safe mode.
Also test if stays on in target disk mode.

threads.title: Mac Pro 2019 - not MacBook
threads.message: I will try tomorrow… today I left the building☺️. I will let you know how it went. :)

threads.title: Mac Pro 2019 - not MacBook
threads.message: Hi’ 2informaticos. It boots into safemode but as soon it starts ssd it breaks down again… Maybe i am loucky to save data through target disk. That is my project tomorrow. Thank you for your good idea

threads.title: Mac Pro 2019 - not MacBook
threads.message: Hi’ 2informaticos. I solved it. Got a “loaner” powersupply and now it boots normal. Why? I do not know. I have ordered a new one from Apple - about 500$:-). Thank you for your time on this
